text: Jingle Jangle is the third studio album released by The Archies, a fictional bubblegum pop band from the Archie comics universe. It was produced by Jeff Barry. It is their first album released on the Kirshner Record label. The album features the hit single "Jingle Jangle". That song peaked at number 10 on the Billboard Hot 100.Whitburn, Joel (2009).Top Pop Singles 1955-2008 (12th ed.). Menomonee Falls, Wisconsin: Record Research Inc. p.47 The album peaked at number 125 on the Billboard Top LPs chart.Whitburn, Joel (1996).Top Pop Albums 1955-1996 (4 ed.).
